name: @anchore/sbom-action
description: GitHub Action for creating software bill of materials

scripts.package: ncc build src/runSyftAction.ts -m -o dist/runSyftAction --source-map --license licenses.txt && ncc build src/attachReleaseAssets.ts -m -o dist/attachReleaseAssets --source-map --license licenses.txt && ncc build src/downloadSyft.ts -m -o dist/downloadSyft --source-map --license licenses.txt
scripts.all: npm run build && npm run format && npm run lint && npm run package && npm test
scripts.precommit: pretty-quick --staged && npm run package && git add dist/

author: Keith Zantow <keith.zantow@anchore.com>
